    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Amplitude modulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang Modulation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modulation d'amplitude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modulação de amplitude</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modulazione di ampiezza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμόρφωση εύρους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modulación de amplitud</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These sinusoidal graphs show a pure-tone information signal (a), an unmodulated carrier wave (b), and an amplitude-modulated carrier wave (c) where its envelope assumes the shape of the information signal.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">AM carrier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude modulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">amplitude-modulated carrier wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">baseband</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carriers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">envelope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pure-tone information signal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sinusoidal waveform</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">unmodulated carrier wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese sinusförmigen Diagramme zeigen ein Reinton
Nachrichtenzeichen (a), eine unmodulated Trägerschwingung (b) und 
eine Umfang-modulierte Trägerschwingung (c), in der sein Umschlag die
Form des Nachrichtenzeichens annimmt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces graphiques sinusoïdaux montrent un signal de
l'information de pur-tonalité (a), une onde porteuse non modulée 
(b), et une onde porteuse amplitude-modulée (c) où son enveloppe 
assume la forme du signal de l'information.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes gráficos sinusoidal mostram um sinal de 
informação (a) do puro-tom, uma onda de portador unmodulated (b), e 
uma onda de portador amplitude-modulada (c) onde seu envelope suponha 
a forma do sinal de informação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi grafici sinusoidali mostrano un segnale di
informazioni di puro-tono (a), un'onda di elemento portante 
unmodulated (b) e un'onda di elemento portante ampiezza-modulata (c) 
in cui la relativa busta presuppone la figura del segnale di 
informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι ημιτονοειδείς γραφικές παραστάσεις 
εμφανίζουν ένα σήμα πληροφοριών καθαρός-τόνου (α), ένα μη 
διαμορφωμένο κύμα μεταφορέων (β), και εύρος-διαμορφωμένο κύμα 
μεταφορέων (γ) όπου ο φάκελός του υποθέτει τη μορφή του σήματος
πληροφοριών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos gráficos sinusoidales muestran una señal 
de información del puro-tono (a), una onda de portador no modulada 
(b), y una onda de portador amplitud-modulada (c) donde su sobre asume
la dimensión de una variable de la señal de información.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Morgens Fördermaschine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang Modulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
